experience.description: Monitorables is an online market research store aiming specifically at e-commerce industry. I involved marketing and handling the business side of the things as well as maintaining the website.

Social Swag is a digital marketing company which focuses on creating content for the web. My duty was maintaining their custom built content management platform. Building new features, fixing bugs, improving the codebase. Often I would design and code banners and landing pages for their old clients.
Building websites, landing pages, html emails, creating social media posts, banners and handling graphic design work.
Maintaining company's Wordpress website, social media, Google analytics, email marketing, SEO and graphic design.
